name: atlas-component-geospatial
description: is an open source software tool for researchers to conduct scientific analyses on standardized observational data converted to the OMOP Common Data Model V5

scripts.prep: npm i && npm run clean && npm run genversion
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build:dev
scripts.genversion: genversion -s js/version/version.js && r_js -convert js/version js/ && rimraf js/version

author: Sergey Suvorov
